title: F1 TV on Android and iPhone apps: how to get it and watch on your phone or tablet
description: Never miss a moment of the action: check out this guide to learn how to get the F1 TV app on your Android or iPhone  device and watch F1 races both live and on demand.

title: F1 TV explained: what it is, what it includes, cost, how to get it
description: F1 TV – the official Formula One streaming service – aims to bring the excitement of a Grand Prix weekend straight to your favourite devices. Here's all you need to know about F1 TV.
